name: Block Mania (Defalt_h3l)
description:
The Story

 After an accident with ancient Portals you are sranded in a strange blocky world where you are everything but welcome. Because you are not much of a fighter your only chance of getting back to your world alive is finding the five portal gems to power this worlds portal and get back home

The Game

This game is all about finding out where the five gems are hidden and how to get to them. The low poly enviroment invites you to explore the world and find all kinds of easter eggs as well as interesting places. For all the people who hate themselves there are 100 coins hidden to collect for extra "fun". 

The Why

Block Mania was created for my third semester project at the htk academy. I hope you can enjoy this game as much as I enjoyed creating it :).
